website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a moringa oil with a rich scent and consistency that's known for producing customer-pleasing results, chances are you will be pleased with this product.
pros: Stands out for having a nutty scent – a trademark of moringa oil with exceptional quality
Consumers rave about how well it absorbs and moisturizes skin and hair
cons: One of the pricier options on our list
Doesn't come with a pump or dropper
Listed as organic, but packaging doesn't indicate if it is USDA certified

customer_reviews.title: Moringa Oil
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry, easily irritated skin and this is a single ingredient skin emollient that isn't too greasy, that feels great on my skin. I'm on my second bottle and will certainly continue to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Best moringa.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best moringa oil I have found on the market so far.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Is an excellent oil for oily skin , even for people with seborrheic dermatitis.
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for cystic acne and hair problems
customer_reviews.text: i will put this on my face and all the redness disappear, I have cystic acne prone skin and this have healing powers - it will reduce redness and the size of the bumps overnight - also good for hair itchy scalp and redness - good as a moisturizer and to wear before make up..a little goes a long way
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent  product and service
customer_reviews.text: Excelente! My package was lost on the way but the company sent me the replacement and I am very happy. excellent service and product. I recommend it. the oil is super natural and I love how it looks my skin hydrates me and leaves my skin super beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: kissy

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars
customer_reviews.text: Before reviewing this product. I first wanted to use it for a month, The truth did not impress me at all considering the high price, also I have to wait almost a month to have this product.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Orellan

customer_reviews.title: Momma loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My mother asked me to order it and she love it. Absolutely loved what it’s done to her skin.
customer_reviews.author: The Name’s M

customer_reviews.title: Great product indeed
customer_reviews.text: Great product indeed! Used it for tingling feet and dried skin (feet and face). After 3 weeks of utilization once a day, It eliminated my dry skin problem and oily face and significantly reduced the tingling in my feet. I am expecting more progress the next coming week. Would definitely recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Mamadou Sidibe

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Very good product I’m please with results, it’s non grease absorption it’s great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it...I use it as a moisturizer on my face and hands and my husband has noticed a difference in my skin
customer_reviews.author: chells

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Woodsy, peppery smell. For the price, I hope it's real.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wanz

customer_reviews.title: A must Buy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff and it is a must buy. I use this product on my face every single night and my scars. It absorbs better than any other oil and it haseems cleared up my scars. My face won't except anything else. Also it turns cloudy/solidifies at lower temperatures which is lovely necause it acts like a butter and makes it even eaiser to apply. It has a nutty smell to it which is intriguing which let's you know is the real thing. Buy this
customer_reviews.author: Urysla

customer_reviews.title: This oil is amazing. I use it on my face and I ...
customer_reviews.text: This oil is amazing . I use it on my face and I can already see the difference.I will definitely order more when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: A very nice oil
customer_reviews.text: Great oil, it is just as promised. My trick to applying oil is to spritz water into my hand then add a few drops of oil, mix in hand then apply and rub in thoroughly. The water causes it to soak in quickly without leaving the skin greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Uldall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to soften my skin and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it helps my wife's skin look finer and healthier. It pays it worth.
customer_reviews.author: mc

customer_reviews.title: The best product on the planet for the face and neck
customer_reviews.text: I love Moringa seed oil, it has replaced my day and night cream. My skin looks smoother and the fine lines are going away. I use organic coconut oil to remove my makeup and mascara then I use moringa seed oil as a night cream. In the morning I rinse my face then put Zia papaya mask, then rinse it off and use moriniga seed oil. My skin also appears to be getting firmer. I highly recommend the cold pressed organic moringa oil.
customer_reviews.author: Linda OHearn

customer_reviews.title: the real deal
customer_reviews.text: i simply love this moringa oil. i think its the best out there.
customer_reviews.author: Mocha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased the Moringa oil use it every day on my face gives me a great glow.
customer_reviews.author: Estela Jarman

customer_reviews.title: Esscential oil for skin
customer_reviews.text: My dark spots are looking less dark!! this is amazing
customer_reviews.author: angelica

customer_reviews.title: Every Household Should Have This
customer_reviews.text: The Green Virgin Moringa oil is excellent. My entire family uses the oil on their skin daily. It has improved our skin conditions and smoothed our aging skin. It has cleared my daughter's acne condition by 90% in one week of daily use. I would recommend this product for every household.
customer_reviews.author: Jane W.

customer_reviews.title: The oil of the gods!
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil! I use it on my extremely dry skin, drink it for health benefits and even use it on my face to remove makeup and as a moisturizer. Moringa oil is renowned for being great for preventing wrinkles!
customer_reviews.author: JB Legg

customer_reviews.title: I will continue to use in my personal everyday life & highly recommend the moringa oil for elasticity & medicinal qualities
customer_reviews.text: I found these products beneficial in every way. I will continue to use in my personal everyday life & highly recommend the moringa oil for elasticity & medicinal qualities!
customer_reviews.author: JOSEPH PARHAM

customer_reviews.title: Great oil.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this oil. Absorbs quickly; not greasy at all. I use it on bug bites, cuts, scrapes and on my hot tired feet. Great moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: SET

customer_reviews.title: I use it as a moisturizer on my face and ...
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a moisturizer on my face and to help treat my daughters eczema. It also helps cuts and burns heal really fast.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Lightner

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil! Very fresh... to me it kind of smells like coffee. I put some in a glass dropper bottle and use 8-12 drops once or twice a day, so this will last a long time! It definitely helps my dry skin, and absorbs very well- not greasy at all. Though if I apply it at night, I will still wake up with dry skin, so I have not seen a lasting change in my skin, maybe with continued use? However, I have tried many different oils from cheap to very expensive, and I would say this is my favorite one so far, and the quality that Green Virgin provides is top notch!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great Oil To Invest In
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil! I have never used oil as a moisturizer. When I tried this one I was hooked. It gives me a nice healthy glow and leaves my skin so soft. This quality product delivers as promised by Green Virgin. Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I have started using Green Virgin Moringa oil as aa moisturizer on my face and hands and am really pleased. It isn't greasy and doesn't have a strong odor. My face has a healthy sheen to it after I apply it. My hands tend to get dry and the oil seems to keep them moist and it helps heal the small cuts that I get from the dryness. I have used the Mooring Leaf Power for a while and decided to try the oil and I am glad that I did.
customer_reviews.author: Mullough

product_meta.title: Organic Moringa Oil, Cold Pressed, Extra Virgin, 100% Pure, Food Grade
product_meta.description: Moringa Oil Moringa oil which originates from the seeds of the moringa oleifera tree has been used for thousands of years because of the many unique and diverse benefits it provides. Its anti-aging, wrinkle reducing, and moisturizing properties make it an excellent skin care product. Moringa oil is rich in phytonutrients and can make a great impact on the body's overall health. Moringa oil is so famous for all the benefits that it is used as an ingredient in many high end beauty products. Green Virgin Products' moringa oil is made from cold pressed seeds and are food grade. Every last drop of it is 100% certified organic, pure and extra virgin. Be careful of buying cheap moringa oil as most of the moringa oil on the market is either counterfeit or mixed with cheaper oils. Benefits of 100% Pure, Certified Organic, Cold Pressed, Moringa Oil. Best moisturizer in the world, moringa oil is absorbed into the skin. Look younger, moringa oil is proven to reduce fine wrinkles. Great for relieving sunburn pain and healing the burn. Great for insect bites. Great for cuts, scrapes and burns. Heals warts and other skin blemishes. Amazing relief for sore throats, just gargle and swallow. Great for acne. Great for dry cracked skin.
feature_bullets: 100% Pure, moringa oil in 4oz glass bottle, & eye dropper
Anti aging properties, great for rashes, cuts, burns and insect bites.
Worlds best moisturizer is instantly absorbed into the skin
Really reduces and eliminates wrinkles, gives skin a healthy glow.
